content: Health Samurai and Elimu Informatics are organizing a new FHIR meetup in San Diego, America's Finest City on Aug, 20 at UCSD. All San Diegans are invited to attend, and if you like to speak, please let me know - I have a spot reserved for you! Here is the link where all the details will be published: https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev-San-Diego/events/263231084/.
